duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely move inventory in and around client Data Centers using a variety of technology and equipment.
Maintain strict inventory control and conduct accurate system transactions.
Ensure accurate and timely shipments, receipts, and transport of inventory by hand or using material handling equipment.
Commit to excellence in contribution to overall Service Delivery and align with Milestone Core Values.
Complete other duties as assigned with consideration for quality, safety, and efficiency.
Demonstrate good written and verbal communication skills and excellent customer service.
